TopicTitle: How to make rings work in KSP

Articles.Content:
Since KSP is approaching 1.0 I thought of a way to make rings work.

Rings could be a particle system based thing and when a distance from the rings they could become a mesh and in the graphical settings you can set the ring quality.

High = detailed particles high mesh quality lots of particles

Medium = sorta detailed particles lower mesh quality a medium amount of particles

Low = particles just points of light a low amount of particles

Very low = no particles just a constant mesh

And rings are not a completely flat object for example saturn's rings are about 10 meters thick did i blow your mind? so the mesh and the particles could be the 10 meters or a kerbal sized version Also this can be used for rings other than gp2 such as jool could have a ring system like jupiter or for gp3 or gp4 so yeah I hope you like my idea.
